title: Mini-Ep 174: Smell Ya Later
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 174: Smell Ya Later
itunes:subtitle: Doree celebrates a work accomplishment and Kate is excited to find a spray Aquaphor. Then they hear from listeners about Bag Balm, melasma, and reed diffuser recs. Plus, a listener asks Doree for a lecture — and she delivers!  Activity of t...
description:
Doree celebrates a work accomplishment and Kate is excited to find a spray Aquaphor. Then they hear from listeners about Bag Balm, melasma, and reed diffuser recs. Plus, a listener asks Doree for a lecture — and she delivers!  


Activity of the Week: Watch Wilson Phillips’ Hold On video for a small bit of joy and inspo. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

ECOTOOLS - Shop the BioBlender at your local retailers and learn more at ecotools.com

 

SQUARESPACE - Head to Squarespace.com/FOREVER35 and use the offer code FOREVER35 to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.

 

LITERATI - go to literati.com/FOREVER35 for 25% off your first two orders. 

 

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

 

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.

 

UNDISTRACTED - Subscribe and listen to UNDISTRACTED every Thursday wherever you get your favorite podcasts.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
